mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ROOM R, ROOMOPTION O WHERE R.R_NO = O.R_NO AND R.R_NO = #{r_no} AND R_STATUS > 0
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ROOM) R) M, ROOMOPTION O WHERE M.R_NO = O.R_NO AND RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOM WHERE R_STATUS > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM (R_NO, R_NAME, R_IMAGE, R_PPR, R_PPH, R_STATUS) VALUES(R_NO_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{r_name}, #{r_image}, #{r_ppr}, #{r_pph}, 1)

INSERT INTO ROOMOPTION (R_NO, RO_AIR, RO_CHAIR, RO_PRINT, RO_SMOKE, RO_PC, RO_TV, RO_WIFI, RO_BOARD) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(R_NO) FROM ROOM), #{ro_air}, #{ro_chair}, #{ro_print}, #{ro_smoke}, #{ro_pc}, #{ro_tv}, #{ro_wifi}, #{ro_board})
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM SET R_NAME = #{r_name}, R_IMAGE= #{r_image}, R_PPR = #{r_ppr}, R_PPH = #{r_pph} WHERE R_NO = #{r_no}

UPDATE ROOMOPTION SET RO_AIR = #{ro_air}, RO_CHAIR = #{ro_chair}, RO_PRINT = #{ro_print}, RO_SMOKE=#{ro_smoke}, RO_PC=#{ro_pc}, RO_TV=#{ro_tv}, RO_WIFI=#{ro_wifi}, RO_BOARD=#{ro_board} WHERE R_NO = #{r_no}
UPDATE ROOM SET R_STATUS = 0 WHERE R_NO = #{r_no}
